summary:
This is my Proudspire Manor in Solitude.
Added 4 single beds in 2 rooms for followers.
Crafting stations, clean floor and some changes.
Smelter to the outside. There was no smelter in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Proudspire Manor[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]This is my Proudspire Manor in Solitude.
I've added 4 single beds in 2 rooms for followers.
Crafting stations, clean floor and some changes.
Woodchopping & Smelter at the outside. There was no smelter in Solitude.[/size][size=3]
[/size][/center]

[size=3][color=#00ffff]You need Hearthfire DLC.[/color]

Housecarl's bedroom isn't furnished in the basement.Â 
You can use the console commands if you want to fix this problem.

Go outside first. Then write on console:
[color=#ffff00]prid e25d4
enable
prid e273a
disable[/color]

or you can write on console:
[color=#ffff00]b[/color][/size][size=3][color=#ffff00]at fix[/color]

Turn back to inside and you'll see the furnished Housecarl's bedroom.
[/size][size=3]
You can delete the fix.txt file from Data folder, after you fixed the housecarl's bedroom.

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819?tab=user+files]MY MODS[/url]
[/size]
author: cengo
